ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] My fingers are numb...
ygData.msgSnippet: Lol Minkin :) I bet she was like uh .. but...uh... when you said that hehe. I am not very confident because Tani has always been my alt, so I dont have much
ygData.messageBody:
Lol Minkin :) I bet she was like "uh .. but...uh..." when you said that
hehe.

I am not very confident because Tani has always been my alt, so I dont have
much experience with her, so its hard not to just kinda take the role people
assume you should. I did find out though that barding is a lot easier if
you TELL peopel what to do rather than just sitting back and doing your job
(ala shaman). Its kinda funny,e ven at this late stage in game maturity,
people have NO idea what bards are capable of lol.

Thats a good thread btw :) Lots of info!

Tani/Halana

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 25, 2001 9:22 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] My fingers are numb...
>
>
> funny you should mention that. I was asking the same
> question today on
> concerthall. for some oddball reason our mez overwrites
> chanter mez. I've
> had a few bored chanters/confused when I start CC. Was
> grouped with an old
> guildie from sol ro yesterday when I had to mez 4 at a time
> while they beat
> the 5th down and she was quite "wow bards can do that?" and
> rest of group
> was somewhat like that too. I told her, I'm not a manasong bard...
>
> Anyways, here's the thread
> http://pub5.ezboard.com/ftheconcerthallbackstage.showMessage?t
> opicID=10171.t
> opic
>
> Minkin
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: June 25, 2001 11:05 AM
> To: 'EQbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] My fingers are numb...
>
>
> Played Tani for most of the weekend, had a blast. I've spent
> most of my
> higher levels soloing or duoing, and this weekend, I ventured
> into Sebilis.
> Wow, what an education. When we had a chanter, life was all fun... he
> slowed, messed and hasted. I really didnt have to do any
> work but when I
> was the crowd control.. well, wow.. its really hard to mes
> things and then
> still fight the target mob. I started to get the hang of it
> though and
> found outside views really help a lot.
>
> My question is, what is up with the 53 mez and chanter mez?
> I found out the
> hard way (i.e. group death spree) that they don't seem to
> stack!?! But my
> 53 mez seemed to overwrite the 59 chanter mez???!!! Whats up
> with that? Am
> I wrong here? What am I missing?
>
> Tani, 53rd Bardette
> Halana, 60th Shammykins
> Solusek Ro
>
> P.S. Been a while, missed you all! Has anyone quit eq that i
> shold know
> about? Seems like lots are lately =/
>
>
